verbose_text: Correspondingly, enhanced Foxp3 + Treg induction by WT CD103 + DCs compared to CD103 - DCs is abrogated when co-cultured with PD1 deficient T cells (XREF_FIG), suggesting that PD1 signaling also mediates CD103 + DC induced Treg differentiation.
evidence: PD1 signaling also mediates CD103 +  DC-induced Treg differentiation
